1.16.3.1.16.3-16.0.0.1: Initial 1.16.3 release, for more info see the changelog file at: https://github.com/sokratis12GR/ArmorPlus/blob/1.16.3/src/main/resources/changelog.md
1.16.3.1.16.2-16.0.1.2: **Fixed server crashing on startup**, fixed some broken prototype recipes
1.16.3.1.16.3-16.2.1: Ensures ArmorPlus requires GeckoLib 3 to be present to prevent weird errors.
1.16.3.1.16.3-16.2.2: Fixed crashes on world start related to entities and their rendering.
1.16.3.1.16.5-16.3.1:
**QUICK-FIX**: Fixed a crash when booting and mekanism is not present.
* Fixed super star bow pulling animation not being correct.

1.16.4.1.16.3-16.2.1: Ensures ArmorPlus requires GeckoLib 3 to be present to prevent weird errors.
1.16.4.1.16.3-16.2.2: Fixed crashes on world start related to entities and their rendering.
1.16.4.1.16.5-16.3.1:
**QUICK-FIX**: Fixed a crash when booting and mekanism is not present.
* Fixed super star bow pulling animation not being correct.

1.16.5.1.16.5-16.3.1:
**QUICK-FIX**: Fixed a crash when booting and mekanism is not present.
* Fixed super star bow pulling animation not being correct.
1.16.5.1.16.5-16.4.0: First Official Stable Release - Supporting only 1.16.5+. Read the full changelog at: https://github.com/sokratis12GR/ArmorPlus/blob/1.16.5/src/main/resources/changelog.md#armorplus-1165-1640
